species.name: Gran
species.description: The Gran have a keen sense of sight and can see beyond the spectrum of most sighted species, including infrared. They can also detect minute physiological changes among their own kind that revel emotions. Gran have two stomachs and digest food slowly, allowing hem to go without eating for days if need be.
species.startSkills: Begin with 1 rank in Charm or Negotiation
species.specialAbilities: When making ranged combat or Perception checks, remove up to 2 Setback imposed due to environmental conditions or concealment (but not defense).
